attributes.action: replace Trident with the next generation of nuclear deterrent at the earliest possible time, to ensure the continued security and sovereignty of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst we must ultimately strive for a peaceful and harmonious existence, it is foolhardy to believe that all others in this World will share in this vision.

It would be disastrous for us to dismantle the one, ultimate deterrent we as a nation have in place to dissuade such individuals and/or nations from threatening the very survival of our country.

As such, the United Kingdom's aging Trident nuclear deterrent should be replaced with the next generation of nuclear deterrent at the earliest possible time.

This petition is here to give a voice to the silent majority who do not share in the beliefs and opinions of ever-vocal CND.
